document.full_text: the small town of smithville, mississippi may have endured the strongest tornado of the dozens that pounded the southern u.s. this week, packing such force that it hurled bodies into nearby fields, weather experts and local officials said on friday.
document.title: strongest tornado of week hurled bodies into fields
lines_and_colors: the small town of smithville, mississippi may have endured the strongest tornado of the dozens that pounded the southern u.s. this week, packing such force that it hurled bodies into nearby fields, weather experts and local officials said on friday.
